articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "The Value Of India vs Pakistan Match Is That Of A Final": Mohammad Rizwan After Asia Cup Super 4 W.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: In an interview after the win Rizwan said that it is always important for any player to perform in a crucial clash between the arch rivals as so many people are watching it all over the world.
articles.content: Pakistan beat India by 5 wickets in a Super 4 encounter of the Asia Cup in Dubai to make it all level between the two arch rivals in the tournament, having earlier lost to India by the same margin in… [+1540 chars]

articles.title: Super Junior Singapore concert: Kyuhyun tells fans 'We super long never meet liao', but Leeteuk misses pepper crab more than us - AsiaOne
articles.description: K-pop icons Super Junior held their concert Super Show 9: Road yesterday afternoon (Sept 3) at the Singapore Indoor Stadium. The eight idols — Donghae, Eunhyuk, Kyuhyun, Ryeowook, Yesung, Shindong, Donghae and Leeteuk — performed hit songs old and new to the …

articles.title: Not just Squid Game and BTS – Frieze art fair affirms vibrant art scene in South Korea - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Frieze Seoul is the first edition of the international contemporary art fair that is usually held in traditional art capitals such as London, Paris and New York.
articles.content: "Many young people tasted bitter losses from stock and crypto investments and artwork appeared a safe bet, especially after high-profile success cases," said Hwang Dal-seung, president of the Galleri… [+2219 chars]

articles.title: Explainer: Indonesia bites the bullet on fuel prices as subsidies soar - CNA
articles.description: JAKARTA: Indonesian President Joko Widodo on Saturday (Sep 3) raised some fuel prices by around 30 per cent to contain ballooning spending on energy subsidies in Southeast Asia's biggest economy.
articles.content:
